title: Randomly loosing ip?
body: if you check my ip i had enough then restarted my client because i wasn't able to purchase a champion and when i log back in i lost ip for no reason.... you can check my purchase history aswell but this isn't the first first time this  has happened can i please get my ip back or something... im aware its a small thing but im getting annoyed.

replies.body: Are you using the beta client if so its a well known bug. Im trying to find the red post i believe it was meddler who said the work around is to launch the legacy client.
how do i check YOUR purch history amigo?
